content:
When fighting as a Monkey won't cut it, you can turn to transformation power ups to turn the tables on your opponent -- often by turning into your enemies themselves! See where to track down and absorb every enemy's Spirit, and how to learn new extended Transformation Spells. 

  * Spirit Locations
    * Best Spirits to Use
  * Transformation Spells
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Black_Myth_Wukong_Guide.md", within the section "Black Myth: Wukong Wiki Sections" and the sub-section "Spirits and Transformation Spells". The content is presented below:

When fighting as a Monkey won't cut it, you can turn to transformation power ups to turn the tables on your opponent -- often by turning into your enemies themselves! See where to track down and absorb every enemy's Spirit, and how to learn new extended Transformation Spells. 

  * Spirit Locations
    * Best Spirits to Use
  * Transformation Spells
